content: fpsc around the next fptr from r11 and double_crochet from r10 together bphdc in each of the next 5tr 5sc in the ch2sp bphdc in the next 5tr repeat join with a slip_stitch 24fpsc 12fptr 120bphdc 60sc 7 this is a free pattern designed by tally s crafts you may use the photos as long as you credit me and link to my website https //www tallyscrafts com/ or instagram @tallyscrafts you are not allowed to post the pattern and the photos as your own round 13 standing fptr ch5 fptr around fptr from the previous round ch3 single_crochet in each of the single_crochet made in ch2sp ch3 fptr ch5 fptr around the next fptr repeat join with a slip_stitch 24fptr 12ch5sp 60sc 8 this is a free pattern designed by tally s crafts you may use the photos as long as you credit me and link to my website https //www tallyscrafts com/ or instagram @tallyscrafts you are not allowed to post the pattern and the photos as your own round 14 there were 5sc made in r13 you will always skip the first and the last single_crochet of the 5sc from the previous round meaning that you will only work in the top 3 single_crochet standing single_crochet in the third single_crochet from r13 counting from the left side single_crochet in the next single_crochet 6tr ch2 6tr in the ch5sp single_crochet in the second single_crochet from r 13 single_crochet in each of the next single_crochet 6tr ch2 6tr in the ch5 space repeat join with a slip_stitch 36sc 12 petals 12ch2sp 9 this is a free pattern designed by tally s crafts you may use the photos as long as you credit me and link to my website https //www tallyscrafts com/ or instagram @tallyscrafts you are not allowed to post the pattern and the photos as your own round 15 standing fpsc around the second single_crochet from r14 the middle one fpdc around both ch3 from r13 and the first treble_crochet of the petal - together double_crochet before the next treble_crochet fpdc around the next treble_crochet double_crochet before the next treble_crochet continue fpdc around the last treble_crochet before ch2sp ch2 fpdc around the next treble_crochet double_crochet before the next treble_crochet fpdc around the next treble_crochet repeat join with a slip_stitch 12fpsc 144fpdc 120dc 24sc 12ch2sp round 16 standing bptr ch6 bptr around any fpsc from the previous round skip the first double_crochet bphdc around the next 4 double_crochet single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in the ch2sp bphdc around the next 4 double_crochet skip the next double_crochet bptr ch6 bptr around the next fpsc repeat join with a slip_stitch 12ch6sp 24bptr 96bphdc 24sc 12ch2sp 10 this is a free pattern designed by tally s crafts you may use the photos as long as you credit me and link to my website https //www tallyscrafts com/ or instagram @tallyscrafts you are not allowed to post the pattern and the photos as your own round 17 standing single_crochet in the first bphdc after
